DOC.brief_summary: This retrospective review evaluate efficacy femoral nerve block provide analgesia follow reconstructive surgery knee compare postoperative course patient receive femoral nerve block retrospective cohort care prior institution regional anesthesia program . The investigator hypothesize femoral nerve blockade limit postoperative opioid need , improve analgesia facilitates discharge home compare intravenous opioid use follow reconstructive knee surgery .
DOC.criteria: Patients reconstructive knee surgery July 2009 present .
